columns.ResID: The unique identifier for each restaurant.
columns.Address: The physical location of the restaurant.
columns.Rating: The quality rating of the restaurant on a scale.

Restaurant.table_description: The table provides information about various restaurants.

columns.StuID: The unique identifier for each student.
columns.ResID: The unique identifier for each restaurant.
columns.Time: The timestamp of the restaurant visit.
columns.Spent: The amount of money spent during the visit.

columns.StuID: The unique identifier for each student.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.Age: The age of the student in years.
columns.Sex: The gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Major: The unique identifier for the student's major field of study.
columns.Advisor: The unique identifier of the student's academic advisor.
columns.city_code: The code representing the city where the student resides.

Student.table_description: The table provides information about students and their details.

columns.ResTypeID: The unique identifier for the type of restaurant.

columns.ResTypeDescription: The description providing details about the restaurant type.

Restaurant_Type.table_description: The table categorizes types of restaurants with descriptions.
